column3: ANY ROW WITH THE FIRST TWO COLUMNS EMPTY IS A COMMENT.

LINE WRAPPING IS AUTOMATIC. ADD LINE BREAKS TO A
NOTE USING ALT+ENTER IN EXCEL OR CTRL+ENTER IN LIBREOFFICE
IN THIS SAMPLE PROJECT, THE FIRST 8 SHAPES ALL HAVE
A NOTE 1 THAT ADDS LINE 1 QUANTITIES FROM BUBBLES ON SHEET AND
A NOTE 2 THAT JUST COUNTS UP THE NUMBER OF BUBBLES ON SHEET
INSERT BUBBLE NOTE NUMBERS 1 AND 2 OF ANY SHAPE TO TRY OUT CNM.
THE NEXT LINE GIVES A TITLE FOR ANY NOTES FOUND
BETWEEN IT AND THE NEXT TITLE OR SHAPE
THE NEXT TXTHT IS EMPTY, SO TXTHT WILL REVERT TO DIMTXT

8" VALVE, BOX & COVER
PER CITY OF ABILIENE STANDARD DETAIL A-RW-60
WITH DEBRIS CAP PER CITY OF ABILENE A-W-23.

SAWCUT, REMOVE AND REPLACE EXISTING
A/C PAVEMENT
WATER LINE REALIGNMENT BY CITY CREWS
POWER POLE RELOCATION BY ELECTRIC CO.
